segments.text: Sniping is when someone makes a bid at the very last minute to steal something for a bargain price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you're afraid someone is going to snipe your Buddha ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard about a software program called turbid . It automatically submits a bid with just a few seconds to go in an auction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Count me out . I can do without shills and snipers and turbo-bidders .
segments.speaker: S2
